author: Kirsten Korosec
title: The Station: Via hits $2.25B valuation, letters from readers, layoffs in a time of COVID-19
description: Hi, and welcome back to The Station, a weekly newsletter dedicated to all the ways people and packages travel from Point A to Point B. I’m your host Kirsten Korosec, senior transportation reporter at TechCrunch. If this is your first time, hello; I’m glad you…
